#summary Quick start guide

= Introduction =

= Details = 

== Tools ==

 * Java *jdk*
 * [http://maven.apache.org/ Maven]
 * [http://docs.oracle.com/javafx/ JavaFX]

== Steps ==

 * Download the code from the source page.
 * Use *_mvn install* 
 * Go to the javafxgui/target directory
 * java -jar * javafxGUI-1.0.2.jar *

== In NetBeans == 

 * Add *exec.classpathScope=compile* to the "Run Project" Action of the used Maven profile in NetBeans
